name: GonorrheaScreening
title: Gonorrhea Screening
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent lab test concepts for gonorrhea.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element of Laboratory Test Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes that capture a combination of gonorrhea and chlamydia testing.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
